Topic.Title: John Donahoe of Ebay - talking at GS Technology & Internet Conference now

Message.Msg: stock close to all time high close

Message.Title: John, another eBay question
Message.Msg: When I used to sell on eBay I shipped USPS and the cost of shipping would automatically come out of my Pay Pal account when I created a label. I sold something on eBay yesterday and created a FedEx label since it was cheaper (PO doesn't honor Parcel Post thru PP anymore). I checked my Pay Pal account today and the cost of the FedEx label was not deducted. I checked my credit card and there was no charge for the shipping cost on there either. When you create a FedEx label how does it get paid?
I don't see where it was charged to my eBay account either.

Message.Title: Guy Adami's comment on EBAY
Message.Msg: On Fast Money, Adami said EBAY's chart is hauntingly similar to its 2001 to 2005 period. So why is wrong as usual? What was EBAY's P/E in 2005? (And of course Pay Pal wasn't part of the equation back then.)

Message.Title: I Am Loving The Board I Completely Own But A Dead Board Conversationally, With Most Spam Pumpers And "Investors" With Ebay At $56 to $57 Range Totally Proves This Stock Is A Sham.
Message.Msg: Just saying! I'm just glad that broke clown loser who lived here day after day for 12 long years trying to worship me stays quiet trying to hide her unrelenting public humiliation and shame. Ebay stock is the bigger joke but not by much. I am glad HE changed this board. ROTFLMAO!!!!!!!!!!!! Sully
